snippet: New data confirmed that Chinese growth has continued into the start of the fourth quarter as economic policy makers prepare for an important meeting.
abstract: China reports that exports rose 5.6 percent in October from year earlier, reversing 0.3 percent slide and beating expectations for more modest rise.
lead_paragraph: New data confirmed that Chinese growth has continued into the start of the fourth quarter as economic policy makers prepare for an important meeting.

headline.main: China Reports Strong Rise in Exports
